alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 6:42PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dona Ana County through 715 PM MDT... At 642 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Vado. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vado, San Miguel, Mesquite, Talavera and High Valley. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 149 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
